Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., :, /, =, +, - and @.

properties.name: DataProtectionPolicy
properties.description:
The body of the policy document you want to use for this topic.

You can only add one policy per topic.

The policy must be in JSON string format.

Length Constraints: Maximum length of 30720

type.description:
The body of the policy document you want to use for this topic.

You can only add one policy per topic.

The policy must be in JSON string format.

Length Constraints: Maximum length of 30720

properties.name: KmsKeyId
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK to use when encrypting log data.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CMK to use when encrypting log data.

properties.name: LogGroupName
properties.description: The name of the log group. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique ID for the log group.

type.description: The name of the log group. If you don't specify a name, AWS CloudFormation generates a unique ID for the log group.

properties.name: RetentionInDays
properties.description: The number of days to retain the log events in the specified log group. Possible values are: 1, 3, 5, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 365, 400, 545, 731, 1096, 1827, and 3653.

type.description: The number of days to retain the log events in the specified log group. Possible values are: 1, 3, 5, 7, 14, 30, 60, 90, 120, 150, 180, 365, 400, 545, 731, 1096, 1827, and 3653.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.

type.description: An array of key-value pairs to apply to this resource.
